trans-unit.source: Displays an XML document without formatting or using Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT).
trans-unit.target: Viser en XML-dokumentet uten formatering eller bruker omfattende stilarket transformeringer (XSLT Language).

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Specifying XML Data](#specifying_xml_data) - [Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the Xml control to display the contents of an XML document without formatting or using XSL Transformations.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [angivelse av XML-Data](#specifying_xml_data) - [å angi en XSL-transformering](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduksjon bruke Xml-kontrollen til å vise innholdet i et XML-dokument uten formatering eller bruker XSL-transformasjoner.

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying XML Data The XML document to display is specified by setting one of three properties.
trans-unit.target: ## For å angi XML-dataene i XML-dokumentet for å vise er angitt av en av tre egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: These three properties represent the different types of XML documents that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Disse tre egenskapene representerer forskjellige typer XML-dokumenter som kan vises.

trans-unit.source: You can display a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>, en XML-streng eller en XML-fil ved å angi riktig egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties for specifying the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene for å angi XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Document%2A>|Sets the XML document using a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Document%2A>| Angir XML-dokumentet bruker en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Document%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Warning:** This property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: **Advarsel:** denne egenskapen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: Use one of the other properties listed in this section to set the XML content for the Xml control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A>|Sets the XML document using a string.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en av andre egenskaper som er oppført i denne delen til å angi XML innhold for Xml-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A>| Angir XML-dokumentet bruker en streng.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property is commonly set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `<asp:Xml>` tags of the Xml control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A>|Sets the XML document using a file.| > [!NOTE] > At least one of the XML document properties must be set to display an XML document.
trans-unit.target: **Merk:** denne egenskapen settes vanligvis deklarativt ved å sette teksten mellom innledende og avsluttende `<asp:Xml>` koder for Xml-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A>| Angir XML-dokumentet bruker en fil. | > [!NOTE] > Minst én av egenskapene for XML-dokumentet må konfigureres til å vise et XML-dokument.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If more than one XML document property is set, the XML document referenced in the last property set is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn én XML-dokumentet egenskapen er angitt, vises XML-dokumentet som det refereres til i det siste egenskapssettet.

trans-unit.source: The documents in the other properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Dokumenter i andre egenskaper ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying an XSL Transformation You can optionally specify an XSL Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream by setting one of two properties.
trans-unit.target: ## For å angi en XSL Transformation du kan eventuelt angi et-transformering (XSLT) stilarket som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata ved å angi en av to egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The two properties represent the different types of XSL Transformation style sheets that can be used to format the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene to representerer forskjellige typer XSL-transformering stilark som kan brukes til å formatere XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: You can format the XML document with a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file by setting the appropriate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan formatere XML-dokument med en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objekt eller med en XSL-transformering style-filen ved å angi riktig egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen XSL-transformering stilarket er angitt, vises XML-dokumentet bruker standardformatet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties for specifying an XSL Transformation style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene for å angi en XSL-transformering stilarket.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A>|Formats the XML document using the specified <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A>| Formaterer XML-dokumentet ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Using a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object requires `Full Trust` permissions.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A>|Formats the XML document using the specified XSL Transformation style sheet file.| > [!NOTE] > The XSL Transformation style sheet is optional.
trans-unit.target: **Merk:** ved hjelp av et objekt for <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>krever `Full Trust` tillatelser. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A>| Formaterer XML-dokumentet ved hjelp av den angitte XSL-transformering-filen. | > [!NOTE] > For XSL-transformering stilarket er valgfrie.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both XSL Transformation style sheet properties are set, the last property set determines which XSL Transformation style sheet is used to format the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge XSL-transformering arket stilegenskaper er angitt, bestemmer siste egenskapen som er angitt som XSL-transformering stilarket som brukes til å formatere XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The other property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Andre egenskapen ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: The Xml class also provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformArgumentList%2A> property, which enables you to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments.
trans-unit.target: Xml-klassen gir deg også den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformArgumentList%2A>egenskapen, som gjør det mulig å gi XSL-transformering stilarket valgfrie argumenter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.TransformArgumentList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The arguments can be either XSL Transformations (XSLT) parameters or extension objects.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene kan være XSL transformeringer (XSLT) parametere eller utvidelsen objekter.

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Varsler serverkontrollen at et element, XML eller HTML, ble analysert, og legger til elementet i serverkontrollen <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer elementet analysere.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: obj is not of type .
trans-unit.target: objer ikke av typen .

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and returns the base server control identifier.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen og returnerer base server kontroll-IDen.

trans-unit.source: The base server control identifier.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for kontrollen base server.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and returns the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen og returnerer grunntallet <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: The base <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlCollection brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Document property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Document er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: To specify the XML that will be displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Angi XML-innholdet som skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollere ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml.DocumentContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: For more information about these alternatives, see the class overview for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om disse alternativene, kan du se klassen oversikten for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: The XML document to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control is specified in one of three ways.
trans-unit.target: XML-dokumentet skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollen er angitt i én av tre måter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>-objekt, en XML-streng eller en XML-fil ved å angi riktig egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Document property is used to specify a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> (representing an XML document) to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen dokumentet brukes til å angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>(som representerer et XML-dokument) skal vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sets a string that contains the XML document to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir en streng som inneholder XML-dokumentet skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The XML document to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control is specified in one of three ways.
trans-unit.target: XML-dokumentet skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollen er angitt i én av tre måter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>-objekt, en XML-streng eller en XML-fil ved å angi riktig egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DocumentContent property is used to specify an XML string (representing an XML document) to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DocumentContent brukes til å angi en XML-strengen (som representerer et XML-dokument) Hvis du vil vise i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DocumentContent property is not typically programmatically set, or set as an attribute of the control.
trans-unit.target: DocumentContent egenskapen angis vanligvis programmatisk, eller sett som et attributt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the XML string is usually set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `<asp:Xml>` tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: I stedet XML-strengen er vanligvis angitt deklarativt ved å sette teksten mellom innledende og avsluttende `<asp:Xml>` koder i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the DocumentContent property contains both `get` and `set` accessors, only the `set` accessor is useful.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om egenskapen DocumentContent inneholder både `get` og `set` aksessorer, bare den `set` aksessor er nyttig.

trans-unit.source: If you use the `get` accessor, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den `get` aksessor, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>returneres.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the XML document to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder XML-dokument for å vise i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to an XML document to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til en XML-dokumentet skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The XML document to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control is specified in one of three ways.
trans-unit.target: XML-dokumentet skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollen er angitt i én av tre måter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName> object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>-objekt, en XML-streng eller en XML-fil ved å angi riktig egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DocumentSource property is used to specify the path to an XML file (representing an XML document) to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DocumentSource brukes til å angi banen til en XML-fil (som representerer et XML-dokument) Hvis du vil vise i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use a relative or an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en relativ eller en absolutt bane.

trans-unit.source: A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server.
trans-unit.target: En relativ bane forhold plassering for filen til plasseringen for Web-skjemaer siden eller bruker kontrollen, uten å angi en fullstendig bane på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The path is relative to the location of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Banen er i forhold til plasseringen av websiden.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det enklere å flytte hele området til en annen mappe på serveren uten å oppdatere banen til filen i koden.

trans-unit.source: An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code.
trans-unit.target: En absolutt bane gir den fullstendige banen slik flytte området til en annen katalog må oppdateres koden.

trans-unit.source: The path to an XML document to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Banen til et XML-dokument skal vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EnableTheming er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to set the value of this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi verdien for egenskapen oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Searches the page naming container for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: Søker siden naming beholderen for den angitte serverkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for kontrollen som skal finnes.

trans-unit.source: The specified control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte kontrollen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den angitte kontrollen ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden.

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The Focus method is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, but it is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden fokus er arvet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>klasse, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to invoke the method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å aktivere metoden oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to invoke this method.
trans-unit.target: Er gjort forsøk på å aktivere denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Gets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data for utforming for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignModeState method is a helper method used to get the current design-time state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignModeState er en helper brukes til å hente gjeldende status for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the design-time data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som inneholder utformingen dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om serverkontrollen inneholder alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen inneholder andre kontroller. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the results to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser resultatene i output-dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The result of the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av output-dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The SkinID property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SkinID er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to set the value of this property throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi verdien for egenskapen oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"></xref> object that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"> </xref> objekt som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document, before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollere for å vise et XML-dokument, kan du angi en omfattende stilarket transformasjonen XSLT (Language) stilarket som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata i ett av to måter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: You can format the XML document with either a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object or an XSL Transformation style sheet file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan formatere XML-dokument med enten en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objekt eller en transformering XSL-filen.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no XSL Transform document is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen transformering XSL-dokument er spesifisert, vises XML-dokumentet bruker standardformatet.

trans-unit.source: The Transform property is used to specify a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object (representing an XSL Transform document) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen transformering brukes til å angi en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objektet (som representerer et XSL transformeringen dokument) brukes til å formatere XML-dokumentet før den er skrevet til utdata-dataflyt.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Using a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object requires `Full Trust` permissions.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objektet krever `Full Trust` tillatelser.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"></xref> that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform"> </xref> som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over valgfrie argumenter ble sendt til stilarket og brukes under omfattende stilarket språket Transformation (XSLT).

trans-unit.source: Use the TransformArgumentList property to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TransformArgumentList-egenskapen til å gi XSL-transformering stilarket valgfrie argumenter.

trans-unit.source: The arguments can be either XSLT parameters or extension objects.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene kan være XSLT parametere eller utvidelsen objekter.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList?displayProperty=fullName> class, see [XsltArgumentList for Style Sheet Parameters and Extension Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList?displayProperty=fullName>klasse, kan du se [XsltArgumentList for stilen arket parametere og filtypen objektene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the XSL Transformation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over valgfrie argumenter ble sendt til stilarket og brukes under XSL-transformering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til en omfattende stilarket transformasjonen XSLT (Language) stilarket som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontrollere for å vise et XML-dokument, kan du angi en XSL-transformering stilarket som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata i ett av to måter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>

trans-unit.source: You can either format the XML document with a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName> object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan enten formatere XML-dokument med en <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>objekt eller med en XSL-transformering style-filen.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen XSL-transformering stilarket er angitt, vises XML-dokumentet bruker standardformatet.

trans-unit.source: The TransformSource property is used to specify the path to an XSL Transformation style sheet file (representing an XSL Transformation style sheet) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TransformSource brukes til å angi banen til en XSL-transformering-filen (som representerer en XSL-transformering stilarket) brukes til å formatere XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata.

trans-unit.source: You can use a relative or an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en relativ eller en absolutt bane.

trans-unit.source: A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server.
trans-unit.target: En relativ bane forhold plassering for filen til plasseringen for Web-skjemaer siden eller bruker kontrollen, uten å angi en fullstendig bane på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The path is relative to the location of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Banen er i forhold til plasseringen av websiden.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det enklere å flytte hele området til en annen mappe på serveren uten å oppdatere banen til filen i koden.

trans-unit.source: An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code.
trans-unit.target: En absolutt bane gir den fullstendige banen slik flytte området til en annen katalog må oppdateres koden.

trans-unit.source: The path to an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: Banen til en XSL-transformering stilarket som formaterer XML-dokumentet før den skrives til dataflyten utdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a cursor model for navigating and editing the XML data associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en markør modell for navigering og redigere XML-data som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to associate an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å knytte et <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objekt med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is created from a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objekt er opprettet fra en klasse som implementerer den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>grensesnitt som den <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>og <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>klasser.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects created by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> objects are read-only, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects created by <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> objects can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objekter som ble opprettet av <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>objekter er skrivebeskyttet, og <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objekter som ble opprettet av <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>objekter kan redigeres.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's read-only or editable status is determined using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Et <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>objekt er skrivebeskyttet eller redigerbare fastslås ved hjelp av <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>klassen.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.CanEdit%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objektet.
